# Tender Cancellation Notification

## Tender Cancellation Announcement

The following government of Canada tender has been cancelled.

* **Tender Reference Number:** PW_HAL_410_11564
* **Solicitation Number:** F6839_215074/B
* **Original Publication Date:** 2022-08-24
* **Original Tender Closing Date:** 2022-09-08T13:00:00
* **Current Status:** Cancelled

### Highlights

* The tender was originally published on August 24, 2022, for bid submissions.
* The contract involved the construction materials miscellaneous, with Nova Scotia as the region of delivery.
* The bidding was to be conducted in accordance with the trade agreements mentioned below.
* The cancelled tender is no longer accepting any bid submissions.

### Trade Agreements

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

### Contact Information

If you have any questions or concerns about this tender cancellation announcement, please don't hesitate to contact Mariam Assal at (902) 233-0685. You can also reach her via email at mariam.assal@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca.

### Contracting Entity

The contracting entity for this cancelled tender is Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) at 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada. The end-user entity for this contract is Fisheries and Oceans Canada at 200 Kent St, Station 13E228, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0E6, Canada.
